description: Born in Americana, São Paulo - Brazil.
Completed a Web Design course at Microcamp, beginning my studies in technology with a focus on web design and visual development.
Graduated as a Computer Technician at Colégio Politec Americana, developing skills in networking and systems administration, including support and infrastructure.

Worked at NW Software as a Developer and Support Analyst. Developed an ERP system in Delphi, created REST APIs, and implemented an inventory management system. Also handled technical support and database maintenance.
Earned a Bachelor's degree in Information Security at Fatec Americana, with advanced training in digital security and systems management.
Worked at IBM as a Backup Administrator, managing backup solutions to ensure data integrity and service continuity. Developed tools for backup monitoring using Java, Spring Boot, and Angular.

Worked at IBM as a Front-end Developer. Focused on front-end development with Angular and React, implementing TDD (Test-Driven Development) and CI/CD pipelines. Leveraged agile methodologies and ensured code quality with unit tests using Jest and Cypress.
Completed an MBA in Front-end Development at Instituto de Gestão e Tecnologia da Informação, specializing in modern front-end frameworks and best practices.
Worked at Softplan as a Front-end Developer. Involved in requirements analysis, feature implementation, and agile project management. Main technologies used were React, GraphQL, and Design Systems.

Worked at Renner as a Front-end Developer. Contributed to a comprehensive e-commerce platform, focusing on product management, payment integration, and responsive UX. Key contributions included custom hooks, Jest unit tests, and component documentation using Storybook.
